review.description:
Awesome! I ordered the Joe Pesci, which is an Italian tuna sandwich with olives, carrots, onions, lettuce and tomatoes. Delicious!

The sandwich was tremendous. It was good enough for two people or one person if you are really hungry. 

The prices are great considering the size of the sandwich and high quality ingredients that they use.

Lioni's - the best Italian hero's in Brooklyn!
review.author: Melissa W.
